# **Euphoria**

[![build](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/Publish%20to%20PyPI/main?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/actions/workflows/publish_to_pypi.yml)

</div>

[Euphoria](https://euphoria.money/) is an algorithmic reserve currency protocol on [Harmony](https://www.harmony.one/) based on the WAGMI token. Each WAGMI token is backed by a basket of assets (e.g. DAI, UST, WAGMI-DAI LP Tokens, WAGMI-UST LP Tokens, etc) in the Euphoria Treasury, giving it an intrinsic value that it cannot fall below. **Euphoria** also introduces economic and game-theoretic dynamics into the market through staking and purchasing bonds. You can read more about Euphoria [here](https://docs.euphoria.money/)

<div align="center">
<font size="4px"><b>W</b>e're <b>A</b>ll <b>G</b>onna <b>M</b>ake <b>I</b>t (ü§ù, ü§ù)</font></div>

## Installation

This app can be downloaded with [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/)...

```bash
pip install Euphoria-CLI
```

...or directly from github

```bash
git clone https://github.com/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli.git
cd euphoria-cli
pip install .
```

## Usage

Euphoria CLI is pretty easy to use with only 2 commands (as of now)

* ```euphoria dashboard``` command can be used to get information about platform like, WAGMI price, APY, Market cap etc.
* ```euphoria stake``` command can be used to get information about your balances as well as rebases.

### CLI Options

```bash
Options:
  -a, --address           # set the wallet address. Helps the stake fuction to get data for your wallet
  -va, --view-addr        # To view the saved wallet address.
  -ra, --remove-addr      # To remove the saved wallet address.
```
